resources.string: We are having trouble connecting you at this time, probably due to a slow network connection or no connection at all. Please check it and try again.
Could not load data. Please check your Internet connection or try again later.

Once a student has practiced with the timer several times it is essential for him or her to also test his or her ability to deal with sound disruptions. We encourage our clients to consider noisy locations so that he or she can gain a handle on what it is like to take test in unfamiliar public place.

It is important to avoid any last minute studying. A person will have a better chance succeeding if he or she goes into the test feeling refresh. Also a student should remember to invoke confidence and stay calm.
Most importantly a student can always take the test again. We often tell our clients that one test does not define who you are.
Every day a student should make a part of his or her day devoted to practicing his or her test taking skills.
Please go to our site to read about the latest helpful tips and hints that will make your studying experiencing more fulfilling.
